attributes.action: stop benefits to all rioters and their families who took part in salford riots
attributes.additional_details: we feel that all benefits to rioters and their families should be stopped and used to pay for damage caused in salford this is our home town where we grew up and we are proud to call ouselves salfordians they have tried to destroy our town they wont break the salford spirit but it will take money to repair the damage these thugs have caused young kids who should have been home what were their parents doing this is why they should be stopped from claiming too moved to wales 25 years ago to get away from violent husband i never wanted to leave salford is where i was born and where my heart is i have a brother and 2 sisters who still live there and other family i love salford i love great britain but i hate and fear what is happening now and how do we change it please help us to get britain back to how it should be great thank you
